about_the_game:
A collection of Extra Gift-EXP items including:

“Extra Gift-EXP” - Earn extra Gift-EXP points in the next battle.
“Extra Gift-EXP x3” - Earn extra Gift-EXP points in the next battle (3 time use.)
“Extra Gift-EXP x5.” - Earn extra Gift-EXP points in the next battle (5 time use.)

Choose your Gifts wisely!

Use these items via the Setup\Items\DLC sub-menu from the Lobby.
detailed_description:

Use these items via the Setup\Items\DLC sub-menu from the Lobby.
name: Lost Dimension: Extra Gift-EXP Bundle

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Lost Dimension: Extra Gift-EXP Bundle

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5 3.3 GHz or comparable
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 or comparable
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 3.3 GHz or comparable
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or comparable
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card
